text: Mohamed Aziz Maswadi is a former Malaysian international lawn bowler and national coach. Aziz was born in 1956 and won the bronze medal in the pairs with Mohamed Tazman Tahir at the 1998 Commonwealth Games in Kuala Lumpur. Four years later he repeated the feat by winning another bronze in the men's pairs with Safuan Said at the 2002 Commonwealth Games in Manchester. He was the Malaysian team coach for the 2010 Commonwealth Games. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1956 births Category:Malaysian male bowls players Category:Bowls players at the 1998 Commonwealth Games Category:Bowls players at the 2002 Commonwealth Games Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in lawn bowls Category:Commonwealth Games bronze medallists for Malaysia
title: Mohamed Aziz Maswadi
